package.name: com.googlecode.flexxb
package.shortDescription: Base package. Holds main entry point.
package.description: Base package. Holds main entry point.

package.name: com.googlecode.flexxb.annotation
package.shortDescription: Holds the annotations defined by FlexXB.
package.description: Holds the annotations defined by FlexXB.

package.name: com.googlecode.flexxb.api
package.shortDescription: Holds the API classes used by the engine.
package.description: Holds the API classes used by the engine. The API Classes reflect the annotation defined in the annotations package allowing programatic configuration of xml processing metadata.

package.name: com.googlecode.flexxb.error
package.shortDescription: Holds the errors that FlexXB dispatches when abnormal execution is encountered.
package.description: Holds the errors that FlexXB dispatches when abnormal execution is encountered. These errors cover all areas of FlexXB: api, type descriptor parsing, xml processing.

package.name: com.googlecode.flexxb.persistence
package.description: Holds the persistable objects. Persistable objects are objects aware of changes in teh owned fields, having the ability to track those changes, commit them or revert to the initial state.

package.name: com.googlecode.flexxb.serializer
package.description: Holds the FlexXB defined serializers. Each annotation has a serializer that ensures proper processing of the xml.

package.name: com.googlecode.flexxb.service
package.shortDescription: Holds classes that allow sending and receiving xml over HTTP.
package.description: Holds classes that allow sending and receiving xml over HTTP.

package.name: com.googlecode.flexxb.util
package.shortDescription: Holds various utilities used by the project.
package.description: Holds various utilities used by the project: the cdata function and the Instanciator class, allowing instantiating objects with a variable list of arguments.
